name: Sahuagin Blademaster

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
text: The blademaster has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
text: The blademaster can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
text: The blademaster can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The blademaster makes three attacks with its wavecutter blade, or one attack with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Wavecutter Blade
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

description:
A cunning veteran of countless campaigns, the sahuagin blademaster decorates its armor with the bones of its defeated foes. As demonstrated in The Final Enemy, sahuagin blademasters often serve as officers in the sa huagin army.
Source: Ghosts of Saltmarsh p. 249, Essentials Kit: Sleeping Dragon's Wake, Locathah Rising
